body: Don't ask a prostitute, "Where do you see yourself in five years?": "In our trade on the streets; the opposite happens; Your value decreases as your experience increases.Quoting five years experience is a turn off. Many a girl gets to prostitution telling themselves they wont do it for more than a few months..."

title: Kenya: Don't ask a prostitute where she sees herself in five years

sentence: Don't ask a prostitute, "Where do you see yourself in five years?": "In our trade on the streets; the opposite happens; Your value decreases as your experience increases.Quoting five years experience is a turn off.
Many a girl gets to prostitution telling themselves they wont do it for more than a few months..."
